Item Description:
Secure Zone ID: To get the ID of your secure zone, you need to go to: Admin > Site Manager > Secure Zones and then click on the Secure Zone you want to add to Muse and up in the URL bar you will see the ID of the Secure Zone. It will be something like "/Admin/ZoneManagement_Details.aspx?ZoneID=51". The ID you are looking for in this example is '51'.

Secure Zone Heading: This is just the heading you would like to show on top of the Secure Zone login form. You can enter any heading here such as "Members Login" or something similar.
Author: Karim Ardalan
Summary: Use this widget to easily add a Business Catalyst Secure Zone Login form to your Muse site.

Item Description: Sometimes you need to add some html code to your page and it needs to appear before the closing </body> tag. There is no way to do that in Muse, but using our simple widget you can insert any code with just a click! Examples include Google Analytics code.
Author: Karim Ardalan
Summary: Sometimes you need to add some html code to your page and it needs to appear before the closing </body> tag. There is no way to do that in Muse, but using our simple widget you can insert any code with just a click!

Item Description: Content Holder Name: Enter the name of the content holder you would like to display on your Muse page. The name should not include the extension. For example if the content holder filename is 'Ad Space.html' you would enter only 'Ad Space' as the Content Holder name.
Author: Karim Ardalan
Summary: Have you ever wanted to insert a Business Catalyst Content Holder into your Muse design? Our widget makes it super simple do add any content holder to your page.

Item Description:
This bundle includes 3 Muse widgets:

  • Popular — Automatically display the latest popular photos from Instagram on your website. 

  • Tagged — Enter a tag and our widget will automatically search Instagram for any photos matching that tag and displaying them right in your Muse page

  • Username — Enter a username and display a feed of photos from that account directly onto your Muse website
Author: Karim Ardalan
Summary: UPDATE June 1, 2016: Due to changes to Instagram’s Developer Platform this widget is no longer functioning and is not available for download. We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused clients who purchased this widget but this was out of our control. If you wish to receive a refund you can contact asupport@adobe.com and include your Order ID beginning with ‘ADO’.
